meanings.definition: A person or thing that gives a particular style or character to something.
meanings.sent1: The fashion designer was the stylizer of the runway show.
meanings.sent2: She used the stylizer to add a unique touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The paintbrush became a stylizer, turning the plain wall into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a stylizer, transforming the ordinary into something extraordinary.
meanings.sent5: The music was the perfect stylizer for the romantic scene in the movie.

meanings.definition: A substance or product used to create or enhance a particular style or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The hair gel acted as a stylizer, keeping his hair in place all day.
meanings.sent2: She applied the stylizer to her nails to give them a shiny finish.
meanings.sent3: The stylizer for the car's interior made it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: The makeup artist used the stylizer to highlight the model's features.
meanings.sent5: The stylizer spray added volume and texture to her hair.
